title: Immune Response to Novel Vaccines
summary: This grant supports research on understanding immune mechanisms triggered by new vaccine platforms.
eligibility: Applicants must have experience in immunology and access to appropriate laboratory facilities.

title: Targeted Therapies for Lung Cancer
summary: Funding to explore targeted therapeutic approaches for lung cancer treatment.
eligibility: Researchers focusing on oncology with preliminary data in lung cancer models are encouraged to apply.

title: Machine Learning in Mental Health
summary: Support for small projects applying machine learning methods to mental health data.
eligibility: Applicants should demonstrate expertise in AI and access to mental health datasets.
